description: Unofficial Shikimori mobile app Main functions at the moment * Search and view information about anime, manga and ranobe. * Search and view information about characters and people. * View the anime series release schedule. * View and read news and topics. * View user profiles, clubs, and friends. * View your conversations and send messages to other users. * Add anime, manga, and ranobe to your list and favorites. * Add characters and people to favorites. * The ability to join or leave clubs(s).
